review: This is one reason why i seldom go to Sheng Siong ... i don't know what items they stored and i don't want to waste my effort going there and not getting what i need. The promotional items seem repetitious in the few promotions. Reckon SS wants to optimise the floor spaces and margins... making the place so crampy one can hardy walk freely. Frankly, i don't enjoy going there to shop for groceries; one got to walk like a crab at times🤔.
